ASME BPVC.II.A-2025 SA/JIS G3118 
2. Austenitic Grain Size 
2.1 "5 or more" in para. 8 shall mean "5 or finer." 
3. Source 
3.1 See Nonmandatory Appendix A for ordering infor­
mation to obtain an English language copy of JIS G3118 
and its references. 
1603
